data.expected_result: There is text underneath that explains what using data will do with a hyperlink to learn more like on desktop
data.short_description: There is no text under “Use data to customise your Discord experience” like on desktop in settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Privacy & Safety in settings on desktop - Scroll down to the “Use data to customise my Discord experience” and observe the text underneath - Go to Privacy & Safety on iOS and scroll down to “Use data to customise my Discord experience” and observe the area underneath
